posts.title: Designing Better Living Spaces
posts.subtitle: Simple principles that improve everyday comfort
posts.excerpt: A quick guide on light, flow and materials that make homes feel great.

content.text: Prioritize large windows and keep sightlines open. Natural light makes spaces feel bigger and happier.
Define areas for cooking, relaxing and working. Use rugs and lighting to separate zones without walls.

items: Place furniture away from door swings
Keep key pathways at least 90 cm wide

posts.title: Why Green Buildings Matter
posts.subtitle: Healthier homes, lower bills, stronger communities
posts.excerpt: From daylighting to water reuse, small decisions add up to lasting impact.

content.text: Green buildings are efficient by design. They reduce energy and water use while improving comfort.
